name: @axa-ch/generic-release
description: Release script needed to release the PODs to NPM. It releases ONLY lib folder!

scripts.bump-major-beta: npm run test && npmversion --increment major --preid beta --force-preid
scripts.bump-minor-beta: npm run test && npmversion --increment minor --preid beta --force-preid
scripts.bump-patch-beta: npm run test && npmversion --increment patch --preid beta --force-preid
scripts.bump-beta: npm run test && npmversion --increment prerelease --preid beta --force-preid

author: Luca Mele
